resources.string:
On this screen, you can play the radio, save preset stations, and scan stations. We hope you'll rotate your phone to landscape mode so that the interface looks like the screen of a car radio. 

In order to save a station to a preset area, pull up the station you would like to save and then long hold in the preset area you want to save it to. 

The single and double arrows are how you switch stations. If you click on the single arrows, the next station will be shown. If you click on one of the double arrows the radio will scan in that direction, switching every 5 seconds. It will continue scanning until you click another option. 

Clicking on the globe icon will open a website associated with the station.

This screen shows you all stations in the radio application. If you click on one of the stations, a pop up will show up with all the information on that station. You can then click ‘Play’ if you would like that station to begin playing in your radio, or click the back button to go back to the list of all stations.
This is the loading screen. If the radio does not load, please check your internet connection and close the app and open it again.
Uh Oh! No internet connectivity was detected.
There was an error retrieving the application data
